explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a novel machine learning model named Graph Attention Long Short-Term Memory (GALSTM) for stock correlation analysis and price prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The GALSTM model is a deep learning approach that combines graph attention mechanisms with LSTM networks.
explanations.neural network: The GALSTM model is based on neural networks, specifically LSTM networks with attention mechanisms.
explanations.long short-term memory: The model uses LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks to learn the weighting matrix underlying the dynamic graph of stock correlations.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly mentions the use of LSTM in the GALSTM model for stock price prediction.
explanations.attention mechanism: The GALSTM model incorporates an attention mechanism to learn the weighting matrix for the dynamic graph of stock correlations.
